snippet: Facebook announced that it was the first social network to reach one billion active users on the site. Although a few companies can claim to have had more than a billion customers, Facebook is the first social network to hit that number.
abstract: Facebook announced that it was the first social network to reach one billion active users on the site. Although a few companies can claim to have had more than a billion customers, Facebook is the first social network to hit that number.

byline.original: By SOMINI SENGUPTA and NICK BILTON

headline.main: A Billion Users Raise Stakes at Facebook for Revenue
headline.print_headline: Billion Users Raise Stakes At Facebook For Revenue
